🎓 SCRUM AT SCALE COACH TRAINING
===============================

📚 TRAINING PROGRAM: Advanced SAFe® Leadership
📅 Duration: 2-day intensive workshop
🏆 Certification: SAFe® Release Train Engineer (RTE)

🎯 LEARNING OBJECTIVES:
  1. 🚀 ART Launch and Facilitation
     • PI Planning facilitation techniques
     • Inspect & Adapt workshop leadership
     • System Demo orchestration

  2. 🔄 Continuous Improvement Leadership
     • Kaizen event facilitation
     • Value stream mapping
     • Metrics-driven improvement

  3. 🤝 Servant Leadership in Action
     • Impediment removal strategies
     • Cross-functional team coaching
     • Conflict resolution techniques

🛠️ PRACTICAL EXERCISES:
  ✅ Mock PI Planning Session (4 hours)
  ✅ Problem-Solving Workshop Facilitation
  ✅ ART Metrics Analysis and Action Planning
  ✅ Difficult Conversation Role-Playing

📈 COACHING COMPETENCY AREAS:
  🎯 Agile Coaching: Advanced (Level 4/5)
  🏗️ Technical Coaching: Intermediate (Level 3/5)
  🤝 Enterprise Coaching: Advanced (Level 4/5)
  📊 Lean-Agile Leadership: Expert (Level 5/5)
